skins.name: Luuk Herssen
skins.description: A healer who acts with calm precision, but carries a hidden edge in every quiet movement. Salvation and judgment are the two oaths he bears, and between them he treads a line of perfect balance.

tags.name: Tune Strain Response
tags.description: Gains total DMG increase from Tune Break Boost

277.name: Gold Kindled in Ash
277.description:
The DMG of <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> is increased by {0}.
The max limit of <color=Highlight><te href=151003>Dawnlit Keep</te></color> is increased by {1}.
When in <color=Highlight>Aureate Judge</color>, casting Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> grants <SapTag=2>{2}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=stack P=stacks SapTag=2} of <color=Highlight><te href=151003>Dawnlit Keep</te></color>.

278.name: Avalanche Roaring in Eyes
278.description:
The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Definition in Absolute Zero</color> is increased by {0}%.
Inherent Skill <color=Highlight>Uncaused Diagnosis</color> is enhanced:
When Luuk Herssen deals damage to targets inflicted with <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color>, every {1} points of Tune Break Boost he has now Amplify this instance of damage by {2}. This effect increases the DMG Amplification from {3} to {4}.

279.name: Spine Tempered by Golden Rain
279.description:
The DMG Multipliers of all forms of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> and <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color> are increased by {0} in the <color=Highlight>Aureate Judge</color> state.
Inherent Skill <color=Highlight>Pulses Under the Snow</color> is enhanced:
- When Resonator in the team directly damages and defeats nearby targets, Luuk Herssen gains Perpetuating Daytime. The stacking same rules of Inherent Skill <color=Highlight>Pulses Under the Snow</color> apply. When Resonators in the team cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color>, if the target is affected by <color=Highlight><te href=100003>Tune Strain - Shifting</te></color>, inflict the same stacks of <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color> equal to the stacks of Perpetuating Daytime Luuk Herssen has. Luuk Herssen loses all stacks of Perpetuating Daytime afterward.

280.name: Pulse Thrumming Under Rime
280.description: When Resonators in the team cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color>, all Resonators in the team gain {0} All-Attribute DMG Bonus for {1}s. This effect is unstackable.

281.name: Through the Stillness of Snowstorm
281.description:
Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Before Injection of Dawn</color> and Outro Skill <color=Highlight>Bow to the Last Light</color> deal {0} more DMG.
Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Golden Reflux</color> has its DMG Multiplier increased by {1} and Cooldown reduced by {2}, and gains 1 more charge.

282.name: Dawn Unfurling over Frostlands
282.description:
When any nearby Resonator in the team triggers <color=Highlight>Tune Break</color>, Luuk Herssen's Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> and <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color> deal {0} more DMG to the target for {1}s.
Each stack of <color=Highlight><te href=151001>Endnotes on the Endgame</te></color> increases the DMG dealt through Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Definition in Absolute Zero</color> by {2}, up to {3}.
When Luuk Herssen deals any damage, the stack count <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color> on the target is considered as increased by {4}, which may go over the stack limit.

params.name: Such is Light
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Heavy Attack</color></size>
Consume STA to jump into the air, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Mid-air Attack</color></size>
Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks in mid-air, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. Stage 4 is a Plunging Attack at the cost of STA.
<color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack</color> or <color=Highlight>Jump</color> to perform <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> Stage {0} and 3.
Luuk Herssen attacks with Scythe: Dissection when the input is <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color>.
Luuk Herssen attacks with Scythe: Resection when the input is <color=Highlight>Jump</color>. He also inflicts <color=Highlight><a href=【集谐·偏移】></a</color> on the target for {1}s.
While in mid-air, <color=Highlight>hold Normal Attack</color> to perform a Plunging Attack at the cost of STA.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dodge Counter</color></size>
<color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack</color> right after a successful Dodge on the ground to attack the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>. <color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack</color> within a time after casting this skill to cast <color=Highlight>Basic Attack Stage 3</color>.
<color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack</color> right after a successful Dodge in mid-air to flash toward the target, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.

1510007.name: Mid-air Attack Stage 2 Scythe: Dissection DMG

1510008.name: Mid-air Attack Stage 3 Scythe: Dissection DMG

1510009.name: Mid-air Attack Stage 2 Scythe: Resction DMG

1510010.name: Mid-air Attack Stage 3 Scythe: Resction DMG

params.name: Reunion of All the Fallen
params.description:
<size=40><color=Title>Golden Reflux</color></size>
Flash toward the target and deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
<color=Highlight>Golden Reflux</color> has 2 charges.
Can be cast in mid-air.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Aureole of Execution</color></size>
Casting <color=Highlight>Mid-air Basic Attack Stage 3</color> replaces <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> with <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color>, which deals Basic Attack DMG.
<color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color>has {0} forms, including <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution: Ring</color>, <color=Highlight>Aureole of Executiom: Breach</color>, and <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution: Glare</color>.
Casting any form of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> grants <SapTag=1>{1}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=stack P=stacks SapTag=1} of <color=Highlight><te href=151001>Endnotes on the Endgame</te></color> and switches <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> to the next form in sequence.
Switching to another Resonator resets the cycle of <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> and <color=Highlight>Resonance Skill</color> is reset to <color=Highlight>Golden Reflux</color>
Can be cast in mid-air.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Aureole of Execution: Ring</color></size>
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, and reset the <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> cycle.
The next <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> triggers <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Golden Impale</color>.
<color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Golden Impale</color> is no longer available if <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color> is cast in air or Luuk Herssen is switched out in the duration.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Aureole of Execution: Breach</color></size>
Spin and dash forward, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> to enemies along the path and resetting the <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack</color> cycle to Stage 1.
Throw out a whirling blade to attack the target, dealing fixed amout of <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
Only one whirling blade can exist at a time. It cannot trigger <color=Highlight>Counterattack</color> and disappears when other skills are cast.
The next <color=Highlight>Basic Attack</color> is replaced with <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Golden Impale</color>.
If <color=Highlight>Dodge Counter</color> is cast in mid-air or Luuk Herssen is switched off the field during this period, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Golden Impale</color> is no longer available.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Aureole of Execution: Glare</color></size>
Hurl out Solid-State Ichor, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> and forming an <color=Highlight>Ichor Deposit</color> on the ground.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Basic Attack - Golden Impale</color></size>
Flash toward the target and deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Ichor Deposit</color></size>
<color=Highlight>Ichor Deposit</color> detonates automatically after {3}s, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Endnotes on the Endgame</color></size>
Increase the DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Rewritten in Winter's Margins</color> by {4}, stacking up to {2} times. Casting Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Rewritten in Winter's Margins</color> or switching to another Resonator removes all stacks.

params.name: Rewritten in Winter's Margins
params.description:
Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>, considered Basic Attack DMG.
Can be cast in mid-air.

params.name: Pulses Under the Snow
params.description:
When Luuk Herssen directly damages and defeats nearby targets, if the targets were inflicted with <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color>:
- If Luuk Herssen has no Perpetuating Daytime, gain same stacks of Perpetuating Daytime equal to the stacks of <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color>.
- If Luuk Herssen already has Perpetuating Daytime and the stack count of <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color> on the target, raise the stacks of Perpetuating Daytime to the stacks of <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color> on the target.
- When Luuk Herssen casts <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color>, if the target is affected by <color=Highlight><te href=100003>Tune Strain - Shifting</te></color>, remove all Perpetuating Daytime Luuk Herssen has and apply the same stacks of <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color> on the target.
- Perpetuating Daytime stacks up to {0} times.

params.name: Uncaused Diagnosis
params.description:
When Luuk Herssen deals damage to targets affected by <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color>, every {0} points of <color=Highlight>Tune Break Boost</color> he has Amplify this instance of damage by {1}, up to {2}.
If the target has at least <SapTag=3>{3}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=stack P=stacks SapTag=3} of <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color>, this instance of damage is further Amplified by {4}.

params.name: Spark from the Frost
params.description:
<color=Title>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color></size>
When the Solid-State Ichor of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution: Glare</color> is hurled out, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} or hold <color=Highlight>Normal Attack</color> in the air to cast <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color>.
Slam down from the air to detonate the <color=Highlight>Ichor Deposit</color>, dealing <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> considered Basic Attack DMG.
<color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color> is no longer available when Resonance Liberation <color=Highlight>Rewritten in Winter's Margins</color> is cast or Luuk Herssen is switched off the field.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Aureate Judge</color></size>
With full <te href=151002>Ichor Flow</te>, enter the <color=Highlight>Aureate Judge</color> state. In this state, Luuk Herssen gains the following effects:
- <color=Highlight><te href=151002>Ichor Flow</te></color> does not restore. The DMG Multipliers of all forms of Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> increases.
Casting <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution: Glare</color> increases the DMG Multiplier of the next <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color>.
{1} points of <te href=151002>Ichor Flow</te> is consumed each time Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color> is cast.
<color=Highlight>Aureate Judge</color> ends when <te href=151002>Ichor Flow</te> depletes.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Golden Rule</color></size>
When Luuk Herssen is in the team, all other Resonators in the team gain Golden Rule. When Resonators with Golden Rule cast Outro Skill and the incoming Resonator is Luuk Herssen, remove all Golden Rules on Resonators in the team and grant Luuk Herssen {3} points of <color=Highlight><te href=151002>Ichor Flow</te></color> and {4} points of Concerto Energy. Resonators in the team gain Golden Rule again after {2}s.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Dawnlit Keep</color></size>
Luuk Herssen gains <SapTag=6>{6}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=stack P=stacks SapTag=6} of <color=Highlight><te href=151003>Dawnlit Keep</te></color> when he stays out of combat for over {5}s or casts Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Before Injection of Dawn</color>.
<color=Highlight><te href=151003>Dawnlit Keep</te></color> is capped at {7} stacks. When damaged in mid-air, consume <SapTag=9>{9}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=stack P=stacks SapTag=9} of <te href=151003>Dawnlit Keep</te> to reduce the DMG taken by {14} and gain immunity to interruptions for {10}s. This effect can be triggered once every {11}s.
<size=10></size>
<size=40><color=Title>Radiant Reave</color></size>
When Luuk Herssen performs Dodge in mid-air, he briefly stays airborne and sends out a whirling blade, dealing fixed <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color>.
Only one whirling blade can exist at a time. It cannot trigger <color=Highlight>Counterattack</color> and disappears when other skills are cast.
Luuk Herssen consumes STA continuously while airborne.
If Luuk Herssen is launched into mid-air, <color=Highlight>{Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Dodge</color> before landing to trigger this effect, up to 3 times. When Luuk  Herssen is on the ground or switched out for more than {12}s, the trigger count is reset.
<size=40><color=Title>Ichor Flow</color></size>
Luuk Herssen holds up to {0} points of Ichor Flow.
Normal Attacks, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Golden Reflux</color>, Resonance Skill <color=Highlight>Aureole of Execution</color>, <color=Highlight>Basic Attack - Golden Impale</color>, and <color=Highlight>Mid-air Attack - Gavel of Earthshaker</color> restores Ichor Flow on hit.
Casting Intro Skill <color=Highlight>Before Injection of Dawn</color> restores {13} points of Ichor Flow.

params.name: Nod to Dying Moment
params.description: Deal <color=Light>Spectro DMG</color> equal to {0} Luuk Herssen's ATK.

params.name: Silent Debate of Light
params.description:
Luuk Herssen can inflict <color=Highlight><te href=100003>Tune Strain - Shifting</te></color> on targets.
Luuk Herssen can respond to <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color>.
- Responding to <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color>: Every <SapTag=1>{1}</SapTag> {Cus:Sap,S=stack P=stacks SapTag=1} of <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color> on the target increases Luuk Herssen's total DMG against them. Each point of Luuk Herssen's Tune Break Boost increases the total DMG by {1}. While Luuk Herssen is in the team, the max stack limit of <color=Highlight><te href=100005>Tune Strain - Interfered</te></color> on a target is increased by {2}.
Additionally, when the target's <color=Highlight>Off-Tune Level</color> is full, Luuk can cast <color=Highlight><te href=100001>Tune Break</te></color> on the target.
